SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_id, dealer_id, cert_id, cert_number, cert_created_date, record_type, created_date, created_by, rec_cancel, rec_new_business, rec_billing, file_detail_id, billing_detail_id FROM elp_daily_obd_file_detail_temp <!--WHERE file_detail_temp_id = :file_detail_temp_id-->
SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT c.company_id, c.dealer_id, t.cert_id, t.cert_number, cert_created_date, record_type, t.created_date, t.created_by, rec_cancel, rec_new_business, rec_billing, file_detail_temp_id, 0 as file_Detail_id, billing_detail_id
FROM ELITA.elp_daily_obd_file_detail_temp t,elp_cert c where t.cert_id = c.cert_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_daily_obd_file_detail_temp SET cert_id = :cert_id, cert_number = :cert_number, cert_created_date = :cert_created_date, record_type = :record_type, rec_cancel = :rec_cancel, rec_new_business = :rec_new_business, rec_billing = :rec_billing, modified_by = :modified_by <!--WHERE file_detail_temp_id = :file_detail_temp_id-->
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_daily_obd_file_detail_temp ( cert_id, cert_number, cert_created_date, record_type, rec_cancel, rec_new_business, rec_billing, created_by, file_detail_temp_id, billing_detail_id ) VALUES ( :cert_id, :cert_number, :cert_created_date, :record_type, :rec_cancel, :rec_new_business, :rec_billing, :created_by, :file_detail_temp_id, :billing_detail_id )
